column1: Shell command built from environment values
column2: Building a shell command string with values from the enclosing environment may cause subtle bugs or vulnerabilities.
column4:
This shell command depends on an uncontrolled [["file name"|"relative:///test/examples.js:8:3:8:30"]].
This shell command depends on an uncontrolled [["absolute path"|"relative:///test/examples.js:11:22:11:42"]].

column2: Forwarding command-line arguments to a child process executed within a shell may indirectly introduce command-line injection vulnerabilities.
column4: This command depends on an unsanitized [["command-line argument"|"relative:///utils/find-opencv.js:5:12:5:23"]].

column1: Uncontrolled data used in network request
column2: Sending network requests with user-controlled data allows for request forgery attacks.
column4: The [["URL"|"relative:///examples/face-proxy.js:8:16:8:18"]] of this request depends on [["a user-provided value"|"relative:///examples/face-proxy.js:7:13:7:19"]].
